answerText: Cane[10] Besides Jean Toomer, the author of Cane, another Harlem Renaissance author was this one who wrote "Seven Negro Sermons in Verse" in one book and also wrote about a ragtime-playing Ex-Colored Man in another.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 11 | 5 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One poem in this book states, "I crack a grain between my teeth," and, "I am a reaper whose muscles set at sundown." [10] Name this book that includes "Harvest Song" as well as sections titled "Karintha" and "Kabnis."
